Html:
I have no idea how simple or difficult this would be but here goes, could a really simple module for rawr be put together that just shows stats (no dps calculations) for an enchancement shammey?  Enchancement shammies currently have a sim that we run numbers through to generate our ideal choices but currently for each best I want to test I have to run things through excel and add stats individually, it takes me 5-15 mins per piece I want to check.  There is no current paper doll program that works with the new changes.

I just need to see totals for

spell hit, crit, haste
melee hit,crit, haste,ap, arm pen, expertise

str
agil
int

Having a mini module for this would simplify my life greatly.  I don't think it would be a good idea to include this program for general distrubution since the lack of dps calculations would confuse some
An actual enhancement model is in the works.
